title: Subscript
desc: A reactivity runtime for JavaScript, offered in an ordinary JavaScript function! With Subscript we introduce dependency threads for JavaScript!.

features.title: No Additives; Just JavaScript!
features.desc: Try a new approach to reactivity that is based on nothing at all but just JavaScript!.

features.title: Performant JavaScript
features.desc: An insane focus on pure JavaScript syntax - to keep its footprint, and your footprint, ridiculously small!

features.title: Developer "Joooy"
features.desc: Write your code however you enjoy it; forget about hooks and a complex toolchain, and a required build step!

features.title: Progressive Development
features.desc: Try turning reactivity on and off on an existing code base, in an afterthought! Go "progressive" with Subscript Functions!
